title: TelephoneTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the type of telephone number, e.g. work vs. mobile.

oneOf.title: Fax
oneOf.description: A number used primarily for work-related facsimile transmissions.

oneOf.title: Mobile
oneOf.description: A number on a mobile telephone that is often or usually used for work-related calls. This type of number can be used for urgent work related business when a work number is not sufficient to contact the person or firm.

oneOf.title: Personal
oneOf.description: A number used primarily for non work-related calls. (Normally this type of number would be used only as an emergency backup number, not as a regular course of business).

oneOf.title: Work
oneOf.description: A number used primarily for work-related calls. Includes home office numbers used primarily for work purposes.
